purpose.summary: This DBD source file defines the IMS HIDAM database DBPAUTP0 using VSAM access for pending authorization data. It specifies dataset DDPAUTP0, root segment PAUTSUM0 (100 bytes) with unique sequential key ACCNTID, and child segment PAUTDTL1 (200 bytes) with unique sequential key PAUT9CTS parented by PAUTSUM0. The file is processed by the DBDGEN utility to generate the DBD control block.
purpose.business_context: Stores summary and detail records for pending account authorizations, supporting hierarchical access via root account ID.

outputs.name: DDPAUTP0
outputs.description: VSAM dataset hosting the HIDAM database segments

outputs.name: PAUTSUM0
outputs.description: Root segment containing pending authorization summary data, 100 bytes

outputs.name: PAUTDTL1
outputs.description: Child segment containing pending authorization detail data, 200 bytes

business_rules.description: Root segment PAUTSUM0 is uniquely sequenced by ACCNTID field
business_rules.logic_summary: Defined as sequential unique (SEQ,U) key starting at byte 1

business_rules.description: Child segment PAUTDTL1 is parented exclusively by root segment PAUTSUM0
conditions: Parent must exist for child access

business_rules.description: Child segment PAUTDTL1 is uniquely sequenced by PAUT9CTS field
business_rules.logic_summary: Defined as sequential unique (SEQ,U) key starting at byte 1
